title: Steel bar

properties.name: description
properties.value: A Steel bar is an item used for creating steel weaponry and armour. It can be smelted using the Smithing skill at level 30 Smithing by using 1 iron ore and 2 coal on a furnace, providing 17.5 experience points. Steel bars can be used with an anvil to make steel armour and weaponry, granting 37.5 Smithing experience per bar, unless the bar is used with a furnace and cannonball mould to make cannonballs, granting 25.6 experience per bar instead, which is profitable experience popular among low and mid-level smiths.

Please add tips to the subpages, rather than the article below.
Steel bar

Item ID2353

A Steel bar is an item used for creating steel weaponry and armour. It can be smelted using the Smithing skill at level 30 Smithing by using 1 iron ore and 2 coal on a furnace, providing 17.5 experience points. Steel bars can be used with an anvil to make steel armour and weaponry, granting 37.5 Smithing experience per bar, unless the bar is used with a furnace and cannonball mould to make cannonballs, granting 25.6 experience per bar instead, which is profitable experience popular among low and mid-level smiths.

Currently, smelting a steel bar yields a profit of 61. For free players or members without a coal bag, the most bars one can smith at a time is 9, achieved with an inventory of 18 coal and 9 iron ore.

Steel bars can be received as monster drops from some creatures such as moss giants, fire giants and as a guaranteed drop of 5 from steel dragons.

[[File:Steel bar detail.png|left|120px]]
A '''Steel bar''' is an item used for creating steel [[Weapons|weaponry]] and [[armour]]. It can be smelted using the [[Smithing]] skill at level 30 Smithing by using 1 [[iron ore]] and 2 [[coal]] on a [[furnace]], providing 17.5 [[experience]] points. Steel bars can be used with an anvil to make [[steel armour]] and [[Steel weapons|weaponry]], granting 37.5 Smithing experience per bar, unless the bar is used with a furnace and [[cannonball mould]] to make [[cannonball]]s, granting 25.6 experience per bar instead, which is profitable experience popular among low and mid-level smiths.

Currently, smelting a steel bar yields a profit of {{Coins|{{GEP|Steel bar}}-({{GEP|Iron ore}} + {{GEP|Coal|2}}) }}. For [[Free-to-play|free players]] or [[members]] without a [[coal bag]], the most bars one can smith at a time is 9, achieved with an inventory of 18 coal and 9 iron ore.

Steel bars can be received as monster drops from some creatures such as [[moss giant]]s, [[fire giant]]s and as a guaranteed drop of 5 from [[steel dragon]]s.
